Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: config
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Config preferences and requirements for available services. Used to disambiguate which service should be used

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: environment
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Environment this application is running in. Determines whether certain behaviors like verbose/debug logging are enabled.

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: services
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Services that can be created by this application. A copy of these services will be passed to all sub-containers created

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: serviceCache
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: The Application’s private service cache. This cache will not be shared with any sub-containers created by this application.

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: eventLoop
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: This Application’s event loop. This event-loop is separate from the HTTPServer’s event loop group and should only be used

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: extend
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Use this to create stored properties in extensions.

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: asyncRun()
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Asynchronously runs the Application’s commands. This method will call the willRun(_:) methods of all

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: run()
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Synchronously calls asyncRun() and waits for the running server to close (if one exists).

Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.name: runningServer
Classes/Application.html#/s:5Vapor11Appl.abstract: Stores a reference to the Application’s currently running server.

Classes/Application.html.name: Application
Classes/Application.html.abstract: Core framework class. You usually create only one of these per application. Acts as your application’s top-level service container.

Classes/CORSMiddleware.html.name: CORSMiddleware
Classes/CORSMiddleware.html.abstract: Middleware that adds support for CORS settings in request responses.

Classes/ErrorMiddleware.html.name: ErrorMiddleware
Classes/ErrorMiddleware.html.abstract: Captures all errors and transforms them into an internal server error HTTP response.

Classes/FileMiddleware.html.name: FileMiddleware
Classes/FileMiddleware.html.abstract: Serves static files from a public directory.

Classes/Request.html.name: Request
Classes/Request.html.abstract: Request is a service-container wrapper around an HTTPRequest.

Classes/Response.html.name: Response
Classes/Response.html.abstract: Response is a service-container wrapper around an HTTPResponse.

Classes/Session.html.name: Session
Classes/Session.html.abstract: Sessions are a method for associating data with a client accessing your app.

Classes/SessionsMiddleware.html.name: SessionsMiddleware
Classes/SessionsMiddleware.html.abstract: Uses HTTP cookies to save and restore sessions for connecting clients.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
